name: I Am a House
description: Hello! This game is my very first game in Twine, and it's also an outline for an essay I had to write. I'm not going to post the essay here, since it's so full of angst that even I can't stand it, but the main points and themes are all here. You explore the house that represents me. I made all the artwork using pencil and watercolor, with some digital color tweaks.
